name: 3D Spaceship Game
description:
3D Spaceship Game is an exploration game made in Unity. This is my first developed game for my midterm exam in Game Programming 1.

Instructions:

Collect the stars scattered across the area to finish the game.

A/D - Move left or right (Yaw)

W/S - Move up or down (Pitch)

Q/E - Rotate left or right (Roll)

Spacebar - Accelerate
